"Traspo": "Yo! I'm Traspo. I work with the Transportation Division."
"Sounds like there's about to be a bunch of large-sized enemies flooding us from all directions, one after the other."
"That's where you come in, my friends. I need you to take care of 'em."
"Oh! I just picked up some enemy signals, just like the Operators said we would."
"You folks ready for this? We're all countin' on ya!"
